def_cn: 发吧唧声，发扑哧声(像走在烂泥地里似的)
def_en: To squelch means to make a wet, sucking sound, like the sound you make when you are walking on wet, muddy ground.

def_cn: 制止，压制，遏制(谣言、反对势力)
def_en: If you squelch something that is causing you trouble, for example rumours or opposition, you firmly put a stop to it.
